roles.title: Founder / CEO
roles.who_thrives: Operators who can make hard scope decisions weekly and close budget-owner alignment with clear metrics.
daily_work: Run weekly convert/extend/stop decisions for every active pilot.
Join budget-owner calls in week 1 and close week.
Unblock deals that are stuck on scope or buying committee confusion.
weekly_deliverables: Decision log for all active pilots
One-page close plan for each qualified account
Updated priority list tied to conversion risk
interview_rubric: Can explain one past example of converting a pilot into a paid contract.
Can define three hard metrics and reject vanity metrics.

roles.title: Sales / Partnerships
roles.who_thrives: People who can source pipeline in a narrow wedge and win access to the real budget owner quickly.
daily_work: Outbound to target accounts and partner channels.
Qualify against ICP, timeline, and implementation readiness.
Book calls with buyer plus budget owner, not just an evaluator.
weekly_deliverables: Objection log tied to proof requirements
interview_rubric: Can map a buying committee and identify signature authority.
Can show examples of disqualifying weak deals early.
Can defend a pilot value proposition with quantified outcomes.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.who_thrives: Engineers who can ship deterministic outputs, keep metrics trustworthy, and simplify integration friction for real customer workflows.
daily_work: Fix integration blockers and improve instrumentation quality.
Reduce false positives in missing-document checks.
weekly_deliverables: Shipped reliability fixes tied to pilot blockers
interview_rubric: Can design deterministic checks with transparent outputs.
Can reason about trustworthy baseline/endline metrics.
Can prioritize narrow scope for pilot speed.

roles.title: Research Lead
roles.who_thrives: Researchers who prefer falsification over storytelling and can maintain source-backed claims under deadline pressure.
daily_work: Validate claims and update evidence records.
Flag weak sources and confidence drops quickly.
Link sales claims to fact records and source URLs.
weekly_deliverables: New or revised fact entries with confidence levels
Updated prompt pack for unresolved questions
interview_rubric: Can separate source-backed facts from modeled estimates.
Can define what evidence would falsify a claim.
